div.p: Our Integrated Management System allows us to align the processes, equipment, and people's skills across all our projects, building strong relationships of trust with our clients, truly understanding their needs and expectations. We use all our strength to maintain and increase its current performance of safety, quality, and productivity in our projects.

div.p: We deliver integral solutions for the mining industry. Our services include long-term mine development and production contracts. We have the ability to deliver integral services for the whole mine while also offering our specialized capabilities separately, to meet the short and long term requirements of our clients.

p.font:
Redifining what is possible
to achieve your targets

Delivering customized strategies
and designed solutions

Increasing safety,productivity,
and quality of your mining projects

div.p: Our Integrated Management System (IMS) provides details for the responsibilities and governs the resource management, service provision, and measurement benchmarks, all within a robust and practical framework. Our IMS is regularly monitored by internal and external audits to ensure system compliance.

With a 20-year mining history. We deliver integral solutions for the mining industry.Our services include long-term mine development and production contracts. RELIANT completes all the corresponding ground support (cable bolting, shotcrete, bolts and mesh installation, other), mucking, loading, hauling, and service activities. We have the ability to deliver integral services for the whole mine while also offering our specialized capabilities separately, to meet the short and long term requirements of our clients.

We are the leading provider of integral mining solutions around the world using different mining methods. Our Integrated Management System allows us to align the processes, equipment, and people's skills across all our projects, building strong relationships of trust with our clients, truly understanding their needs and expectations. That’s how we deliver best-practice for the most suitable and integral insights and solutions by creating a framework for success for every project.

div.p:
We have a global
presence executing
specialized mining services
around the world

The synergy between Safety and Quality is a
key feature that represents us and runs deep
inside our organization. This combination is
present across all our projects and it has
become our core priority. It is our trademark,
our flagship, and it makes us proud.
Our seal of approval, as always

The interaction between our people and
the technology acquired from the market
makes all the difference, ensuring that our
service offering has a clear competitive
advantage in all our projects.
Our seal of approval, as always

Our ability to discover new trends and our
capability to integrate them with our
collaborative approach gives us the
strength to challenge the status quo
providing out of the box specialized
integral mining solutions.
Our seal of approval, as always

We are constantly encouraging our people to
find that balance between their feelings and
thoughts to develop the best miners in the
world. We look for people with an aptitude
and interest in developing their skills to
ensure that our learning culture continues.
Our seal of approval, as always

We are an organization that designs and executes integral solutions in mining projects, maximizing the profitability of our resources and contributing to staff development through prioritizing safety standards and meeting our corporate social responsibilities.

To be recognized as one of the top specialists in design and execution of integral solutions for the mining industry and a preferred partner in all mining projects, by providing services with high standards in safety, quality, productivity, and continuous innovation.

Our Values define our purpose, our priorities, and the fundamental principles by which we conduct business. Acting according to these values and behaviors defines our culture as an organization, underpinning our good reputation and the promise we make to all our stakeholders. All our people are aware of our values and know what is expected from them.
We provide to our employees the necessary safety tools to execute their work in strict compliance with safety standards, zero tolerance to harm, and to develop a corporate culture of risk prevention.
We aim to achieve ambitiuos goals, passionately ensuring that our services reflect a legacy in the mining industry.
All our colleagues make the difference. When we share our skills, knowledge, and experience we become one united team. We are on this great shared challenge together.

Our Values define our purpose, our priorities, and the fundamental principles by which we conduct business. Acting according to these values and behaviors defines our culture as an organization, underpinning our good reputation and the promise we make to all our stakeholders. All our people are aware of our values and know what is expected from them.
We believe that nothing is more important than our reputation, we adhere to strong moral and ethical principles. The highest level of integrity is fundamental to who we are.

We are efficient and have integral business knowledge to obtain successful results in our customer operations.We observe, investigate, and create trasnformation in our value chain to make our solutions sustainable.
We take our responsibility as a company and individuals to achieve the best results in all the entrusted tasks.
We are efficient and have integral business knowledge to obtain successful results in our client's projects and operations.
We execute integral mining solutions to create lasting value prioritizing safety standards and continually meet the dynamic requirements of the mining industry.

Our Sustainable Development Model is based on our approach to safety, health, environment, quality, ethics, performance and other sustainability-related aspects to increase the value we deliver to our stakeholders.

RELIANT is focused on delivering sustainable value for our people and stakeholders now and in the future. Our sustainability framework encompasses policies, standards, and principles. Also represents our commitment to uphold good business practices, to apply clients’ standards and policies across all projects, and to meet or exceed applicable laws and external requirements. It provides clear guidance to all our people on the societal, environmental, and compliance standards. These guidelines are the foundation of our business sustainability.

We are aligned to international quality standards and respect environment. We value the ability of our staff and the organisation to work diligently and honour our commitments. We fully acknowledge responsibility for all actions, decisions, services and policies.

View our current vacancies that will assist you in planning the next step in your career, or submit your details for future consideration to recruitment@reliantmining.com.Join the best team in the mining industry.
